issue.title: [Packaging][deb] dwz: debian/libarrow700/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libarrow.so.700.0.0: Unknown DWARF DW_OP_172
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15232](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15232). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Failed since the nightly build at 2021-12-31:
https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/4672233398?check_suite_focus=true

```

Fri, 31 Dec 2021 06:59:35 GMT dh_dwz --exclude=libgandiva.so
Fri, 31 Dec 2021 06:59:36 GMT dwz: debian/libarrow700/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libarrow.so.700.0.0: Unknown DWARF DW_OP_172
Fri, 31 Dec 2021 06:59:36 GMT dh_dwz: error: dwz -- debian/libarrow700/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libarrow.so.700.0.0 returned exit code 1
Fri, 31 Dec 2021 06:59:36 GMT make[1]: *** [debian/rules:104: override_dh_dwz] Error 25
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15232?focusedCommentId=17467488) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
